dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4450 IH: National Education Association Charter Repeal Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Harris of North Carolina (for himself, Mr. Rouzer, Mr. Fine, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Brecheen, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Norman, Mr. Roy, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Mr. Onder, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Knott, and Mr. Higgins of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal the Federal charter for the National Education Association.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Education Association Charter Repeal Act.

section.header: Repeal of Federal charter to the National Education Association
section.text: Chapter 1511 of title 36, United States Code (which granted a Federal charter to the National Education Association), is repealed.
